articles.description: Follow live text commentary as Crystal Palace take on Manchester United in the Premier League.

articles.description: West Ham manager David Moyes will leave the club at the end of the season, when his contract expires.
articles.title: David Moyes: West Ham United boss to leave at end of season

articles.description: Lando Norris says his first Formula 1 win was “a long time coming” after his Miami Grand Prix victory.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Lando Norris says maiden win was 'long time coming'

articles.description: Weightlifter Oleksandr Pielieshenko, who represented Ukraine at the Rio 2016 Olympics, dies during the conflict with Russia.
articles.title: Oleksandr Pielieshenko: Ukrainian Olympian dies during conflict with Russia

articles.description: Belgium's Tim Merlier sprints to victory on stage three despite a last-minute attack from race leader Tadej Pogacar and Britain's Geraint Thomas.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Belgium's Tim Merlier sprints to stage three victory

articles.description: Kyren Wilson maintains a five-frame lead over Jak Jones as he moved to within three frames of his first world title.
articles.title: World Championship: Kyren Wilson maintains lead over Jak Jones as he closes on world title

articles.description: Lando Norris' win in Miami was overdue and his talent has been clear for a long time, writes F1 correspondent Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix 2024: 'Lando Norris win well deserved as Red Bull turmoil continues'

articles.description: Captain Virgil van Dijk says he "loves" Liverpool and wants to be part of the club's transition after the departure of manager Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk wants to be part of transition after Jurgen Klopp

articles.description: Manchester City looked like they had one hand on the WSL trophy until everything changed against Arsenal.
articles.title: Man City defeat by Arsenal 'throws WSL title race up in the air'

articles.title: Crewe Alexandra vs Doncaster Rovers: English Football League - League Two - BBC Sport
